title: File Uploads and Handling
description: Learn how to handle file uploads in Express.js applications using Multer middleware
learningObjectives: Understand how file uploads work in web applications
Install and configure Multer middleware for file uploads
Handle single and multiple file uploads
Implement file type validation and size limits
Configure custom storage destinations and filenames
Serve uploaded files back to users
Implement proper error handling for uploads
Apply security best practices for file uploads
prerequisites: Basic understanding of HTTP requests and responses
Understanding of form data and content types
